question: What is the name of the browser developer tools tab that allows you to test JavaScript code snippets?
What does the "defer" tag do in an HTML &ltscript&gt element?

choices.1: Defers loading of JavaScript code until all HTML elements have been loaded
choices.2: Skips this &ltscript&gt element until all other &ltscript&gt elements have been loaded
choices.3: Defers loading of all HTML elements until all JavaScript code has been loaded and run
choices.4: Loads this &ltscript&gt element before all other &ltscript&gt elements

question:
What is the output of the following code?

let arr = [5, 3, 1, 2, 4, 1, 7, 9, 0, 8];

for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
     if (i < 5)
     console.log(arr[i] + i);
}
How does an anonymous function expression differ from a normal anonymous function?

choices.1: An anonymous function expression stores its result in a variable
choices.2: An anonymous function expression is executed immediately after it has been declared
choices.3: An anonymous function expression cannot be explicitly referenced
choices.4: An anonymous function expression has access to both global and local scope variables

question:
Which of the following methods are valid examples of object property access in JavaScript?

1) let val = object.property;
2) let val = object["property"];

choices.1: Method 1 is valid and method 2 is not valid
choices.2: Method 2 is valid and method 1 is not valid
choices.3: Method 1 and method 2 are both valid
choices.4: Method 1 and method 2 are both invalid
